casebody.data:
Mamta NATH, Individually and as Administratrix ad Prosequendum and General Administrator for the Estate of Bhuwanneshwar Nath, Plaintiffs-Respondents,
v.
SHOP RITE OF NORTH BRUNSWICK, Defendant-Movant,
and
Foodarama Supermarkets, Inc. and John Does 1-20, Defendants. M-1093 September Term 2018
082861 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 13, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal is denied.
